casebody.data:
David WICHNOSKI, O.D., P.A., et al.
v.
PIEDMONT FIRE PROTECTION SYSTEMS, LLC, et al. 26PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 8, 2018 John W. Reis, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Main Street America Assurance Company. Jay M. Goldstein, Attorney at Law, Albert S. Nalibotsky, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for David Wichnoski, O.D., P.A., et al.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 8th of January 2018 to Continue Oral Argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of January 2018."
